title: [Self-directed] Chemistry Experiment Competency Enhancement Course Using Digital Sequential Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts (atomic structure, chemical equations) and foundational laboratory procedures
context.additional_context: A process of conducting redox reaction experiments using step-by-step digital support tools based on smartphones. Provides customized support considering learners' prior experiences and self-efficacy

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete 80% or more of the five stages (planning, preparation, execution, analysis, reporting) of redox reaction experiments using digital sequential scaffolding provided via a mobile app.
Learners can self-correct in 70% or more of cases when experimental errors occur by utilizing visual guidance (videos/animations) from scaffolding tools.
Learners can achieve 85 points or higher on assessment items related to redox reaction concepts (oxidation number, electron transfer) through a total of three experimental performances.

resources: Response Experiment Kit (Miniature Electropolarization Device, Indicators)
Smart Device-Compatible Experimental Data Analysis Tool
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
